attributes.action: Make the CSA means test the income of the resident parent when calculating payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the income of the person receiving maintenance should be means tested when calculating payments so as to stop extortionate payments being given by low-income non-resident parents to higher income recipients. Too many people use the CSA to challenge the other party instead of mediating to resolve their issues.
